languages.text: {n}Зауэрбэк осторожно произносит:{/n} "Я — верный слуга вашей династии... Но вы спросили, и я отвечу. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} слишком долго живет под {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольными Торговцами{/g}. Дарованные им привилегии заставляют людей считать, что и простолюдинам не обязательно соблюдать запреты {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Зауэрбэк осторожно произносит:{/n} "Я — верный слуга вашей династии... Но вы спросили, и я отвечу. Простор Коронус слишком долго живет под Вольными Торговцами. Дарованные им привилегии заставляют людей считать, что и простолюдинам не обязательно соблюдать запреты Империума".

languages.text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Зауэрбэк осторожно произносит:{/n} "Я — верный слуга вашей династии... Но вы спросили, и я отвечу. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} слишком долго живет под {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольными Торговцами{/g}. Дарованные им привилегии заставляют людей считать, что и простолюдинам не обязательно соблюдать запреты {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

Too long has the Koronus Expanse lived under the rule of Rogue Traders. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the Imperium."

The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the Imperium."

Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

{n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

{n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは注意深く話す。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝の忠実な臣下です…しかし、陛下が尋ねたからにはお答えしましょう。あまりにも長い間、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の統治下にありました。自由開拓者に特権が与えられることで、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}が定めている禁止事項を一般市民からも除外できると考える輩を生んでいるのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは注意深く話す。{/n}「私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝の忠実な臣下です…しかし、陛下が尋ねたからにはお答えしましょう。あまりにも長い間、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の統治下にありました。自由開拓者に特権が与えられることで、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}が定めている禁止事項を一般市民からも除外できると考える輩を生んでいるのです」

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯谨慎地说道。{/n}“我是您王朝忠实的仆人……既然您问到了，那我就回答您。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}已经被{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}统治得太久了，行商浪人享有各种各样的特权，这会让平民百姓误以为他们也有权摒弃{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的禁令。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯谨慎地说道。{/n}“我是您王朝忠实的仆人……既然您问到了，那我就回答您。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}已经被{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}统治得太久了，行商浪人享有各种各样的特权，这会让平民百姓误以为他们也有权摒弃{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的禁令。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius dice precavido:{/n} «Sabe bien que sirvo con lealtad a su dinastía... pero, ya que me lo pregunta, responderé. Tiempo ha que la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} vive bajo el mandato de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. Los privilegios que se les confieren hacen que la plebe se piense que también puede hacer caso omiso a las prohibiciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius dice precavido:{/n} «Sabe bien que sirvo con lealtad a su dinastía... pero, ya que me lo pregunta, responderé. Tiempo ha que la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} vive bajo el mandato de los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. Los privilegios que se les confieren hacen que la plebe se piense que también puede hacer caso omiso a las prohibiciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

languages.text: « Je suis un fidèle serviteur de votre dynastie, {n}déclare Macharius avec prudence,{/n} mais puisque vous m'avez posé la question, je me dois d'y répondre. Voilà trop longtemps que les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont sous le joug des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Ils jouissent de tels privilèges que les roturiers en viennent à croire qu'ils peuvent eux aussi ignorer les interdictions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis un fidèle serviteur de votre dynastie, {n}déclare Macharius avec prudence,{/n} mais puisque vous m'avez posé la question, je me dois d'y répondre. Voilà trop longtemps que les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont sous le joug des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Ils jouissent de tels privilèges que les roturiers en viennent à croire qu'ils peuvent eux aussi ignorer les interdictions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Macharius sagt mit Bedacht:{/n} "Ich bin ein loyaler Diener Eurer Dynastie ... aber Ihr habt gefragt, und ich werde antworten. Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} steht schon zu lange unter der Herrschaft von {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlern{/g}. Ihre Privilegien lassen Leute glauben, auch normales Volk könne die Verbote des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} missachten."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. Too long has the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} lived under the rule of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius sagt mit Bedacht:{/n} "Ich bin ein loyaler Diener Eurer Dynastie ... aber Ihr habt gefragt, und ich werde antworten. Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung} steht schon zu lange unter der Herrschaft von {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader{/g}Freihändlern{/g}. Ihre Privilegien lassen Leute glauben, auch normales Volk könne die Verbote des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} missachten."

languages.text: {n}Macharius, temkini elden bırakmadan söze giriyor.{/n} "Hanedanlığınızın sadık bir hizmetkârıyım... Lakin madem siz sordunuz, bana da cevap vermek düşer. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}, çok uzun zamandır {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacirlerin{/g} hâkimiyeti altında. Hür Tacirlere bahşedilen ayrıcalıklar yüzünden halk da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} yasaklarına uymayabileceklerini sanıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius says with caution,{/n} "I am your dynasty's loyal servant... But you have asked, and I will answer. The privileges granted to them make people think that commoners too can dismiss the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

Lakin madem siz sordunuz, bana da cevap vermek düşer. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}, çok uzun zamandır {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}lerin hakimiyeti altında. Hür Tacirlere bahşedilen ayrıcalıklar yüzünden halk da {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} yasaklarına uymayabileceklerini sanıyor."
